title: Error building latest release
body:
I got this error trying to make with go1.16

commit: `75ad819cc56f9426ec70e51ccf678a73c94c9e2b`
go version: `go1.16 linux/amd64`

```
Building mdbx
cd ethdb/mdbx/dist/ && make clean && make mdbx-static.o && cat config.h
make[1]: Entering directory '/data/github/turbo-geth/ethdb/mdbx/dist'
rm -rf mdbx_stat mdbx_copy mdbx_dump mdbx_load mdbx_chk mdbx_test @* *.[ao] *.[ls]o *.so *.dSYM *~ tmp.db/* \
	*.gcov *.log *.err src/*.o test/*.o mdbx_example dist \
	config.h src/config.h src/version.c *.tar*
make[1]: Leaving directory '/data/github/turbo-geth/ethdb/mdbx/dist'
make[1]: Entering directory '/data/github/turbo-geth/ethdb/mdbx/dist'
(echo '#define MDBX_BUILD_TIMESTAMP "2021-02-25T08:37:37-0600"' \
&& echo '#define MDBX_BUILD_FLAGS "-std=gnu++2a -O2 -g -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wpedantic -ffunction-sections -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -std=gnu11 -pthread -Wno-error=attributes  -Wl,--gc-sections,-z,relro,-O1  -lrt "' \
&& echo '#define MDBX_BUILD_COMPILER "cc (Ubuntu 9.3.0-17ubuntu1~20.04) 9.3.0"' \
&& echo '#define MDBX_BUILD_TARGET "x86_64-linux-gnu"' \
) > config.h
cc -O2 -g -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wpedantic -ffunction-sections -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -std=gnu11 -pthread -Wno-error=attributes  -DNDEBUG=1 '-DMDBX_CONFIG_H="config.h"' -ULIBMDBX_EXPORTS -c mdbx.c -o mdbx-static.o
make[1]: Leaving directory '/data/github/turbo-geth/ethdb/mdbx/dist'
#define MDBX_BUILD_TIMESTAMP "2021-02-25T08:37:37-0600"
#define MDBX_BUILD_FLAGS "-std=gnu++2a -O2 -g -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wpedantic -ffunction-sections -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -std=gnu11 -pthread -Wno-error=attributes  -Wl,--gc-sections,-z,relro,-O1  -lrt "
#define MDBX_BUILD_COMPILER "cc (Ubuntu 9.3.0-17ubuntu1~20.04) 9.3.0"
#define MDBX_BUILD_TARGET "x86_64-linux-gnu"
env GO111MODULE=on go build -trimpath -o /data/github/turbo-geth/build/bin/tg -tags "mdbx" -ldflags "-X main.gitCommit=75ad819cc56f9426ec70e51ccf678a73c94c9e2b" ./cmd/tg
# runtime
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mgcsweepbuf.go:87:80: memstats.gc_sys undefined (type mstats has no field or method gc_sys)
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mgcsweepbuf.go:106:102: memstats.gc_sys undefined (type mstats has no field or method gc_sys)
make: *** [Makefile:38: tg] Error 2
```

I reverted to `go1.15.8` and got this:
```
Building mdbx
cd ethdb/mdbx/dist/ && make clean && make mdbx-static.o && cat config.h
make[1]: Entering directory '/data/github/turbo-geth/ethdb/mdbx/dist'
rm -rf mdbx_stat mdbx_copy mdbx_dump mdbx_load mdbx_chk mdbx_test @* *.[ao] *.[ls]o *.so *.dSYM *~ tmp.db/* \
	*.gcov *.log *.err src/*.o test/*.o mdbx_example dist \
	config.h src/config.h src/version.c *.tar*

&& echo '#define MDBX_BUILD_FLAGS "-std=gnu++2a -O2 -g -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wpedantic -ffunction-sections -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -std=gnu11 -pthread -Wno-error=attributes  -Wl,--gc-sections,-z,relro,-O1  -lrt "' \
&& echo '#define MDBX_BUILD_COMPILER "cc (Ubuntu 9.3.0-17ubuntu1~20.04) 9.3.0"' \
&& echo '#define MDBX_BUILD_TARGET "x86_64-linux-gnu"' \
) > config.h
cc -O2 -g -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wpedantic -ffunction-sections -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -std=gnu11 -pthread -Wno-error=attributes  -DNDEBUG=1 '-DMDBX_CONFIG_H="config.h"' -ULIBMDBX_EXPORTS -c mdbx.c -o mdbx-static.o
make[1]: Leaving directory '/data/github/turbo-geth/ethdb/mdbx/dist'
#define MDBX_BUILD_TIMESTAMP "2021-02-25T08:41:33-0600"
#define MDBX_BUILD_FLAGS "-std=gnu++2a -O2 -g -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wpedantic -ffunction-sections -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -std=gnu11 -pthread -Wno-error=attributes  -Wl,--gc-sections,-z,relro,-O1  -lrt "
#define MDBX_BUILD_COMPILER "cc (Ubuntu 9.3.0-17ubuntu1~20.04) 9.3.0"
#define MDBX_BUILD_TARGET "x86_64-linux-gnu"
env GO111MODULE=on go build -trimpath -o /data/github/turbo-geth/build/bin/tg -tags "mdbx" -ldflags "-X main.gitCommit=75ad819cc56f9426ec70e51ccf678a73c94c9e2b" ./cmd/tg
# runtime
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mcheckmark.go:37:2: undefined: assertWorldStopped
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mcheckmark.go:42:18: arena.checkmarks undefined (type *heapArena has no field or method checkmarks)
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mcheckmark.go:46:82: memstats.gcMiscSys undefined (type mstats has no field or method gcMiscSys)
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mcheckmark.go:50:9: arena.checkmarks undefined (type *heapArena has no field or method checkmarks)
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mcheckmark.go:91:61: arena.checkmarks undefined (type *heapArena has no field or method checkmarks)
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mcheckmark.go:93:17: arena.checkmarks undefined (type *heapArena has no field or method checkmarks)
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/metrics.go:315:2: undefined: heapStatsDelta
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/mgcmark.go:1687:5: useCheckmark redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /usr/local/go/src/runtime/mcheckmark.go:31:5
make: *** [Makefile:38: tg] Error 2
```
Try “go clean -cache -modcache” and build again with 1.15.*

Didn't work. Looks like it cleared the cache as it's re-downloading stuff, but same error.

Hmm, I don't see any errors related to [MDBX](https://github.com/erthink/libmdbx).
Please clarify if I'm wrong.

I could have the title wrong, maybe it is a `tg` build error, I just saw that the very first line is "Building mdbx" and I didn't see a subsequent "Building x" line

Yeah, looking at the make file it's not clear to me, but it looks like make on mxdb is complete by the time it errors out?

> Yeah, looking at the make file it's not clear to me, but it looks like make on mxdb is complete by the time it errors out?

Yes, it looks much like that.
I filed an issue (to make sure) to make mdbx' build scripts less verbose and to avoid such confusion in the future.
It seems to have built just fine on another server. I'm not sure what's wrong here.

Ok I figured it out, it was a conflict from upgrading go1.15 to go1.16 - there were residual files that were not overwritten (or removed) correctly. The fix was to wipe my `/usr/local/go` folder and re-install the go tar.

It's working with both 1.15 and 1.16 now
